notes: Programme locations are shown where known; items marked TBC should be confirmed before final publication.
Ticket prices and availability can change; this app links to the official booking portal as the source of truth.
If you plan to store downloadable files in GitHub, keep an eye on repository size and any distribution permissions.
local_tips: English is widely spoken in tourist areas and hotels.
Airport–city travel: Metro Line 3, Express bus X95 (Syntagma), or taxi.
